competitors.name: Paychex
competitors.notes: Major payroll and HR services provider

competitors.name: Ceridian
competitors.notes: HR and payroll solutions with Dayforce

context: In 2015, Paylocity had recently IPO'd (March 2014) and competed with Paycom in the cloud HCM mid-market. The company focused on modern user experience and client service. Traditional payroll giants ADP and Paychex were migrating customers to cloud solutions. Ultimate Software and Ceridian were growing cloud HCM competitors. Market dynamics favored cloud-native platforms over legacy on-premises systems.
